channel.title: Doomsquad on mattischrome
channel.description: Recent content in Doomsquad on mattischrome

item.title: Album Digest, August 2016
item.description: As I mentioned in yesterday’s post, I allowed Spotify to pick some new albums for me this month. It chose some noodly ambient techno, a captivating slice of World Jazz, a moody gothic hallucination, and a concept album about humans being rescued by aliens. All in all a pretty good job! Here is the list: Prins Thomas “Principe del Norte” Sarathy Korwar “Day to Day” Doomsquad “Total Time” United Vibrations “The Myth of the Golden Ratio” Prins Thomas “Principe del Norte” Prins Thomas recently remixed the Orb’s “Alpine EP” so I’m not surprised that Spotify included one of his tracks on my Discover Weekly playlist.
